extDesc.message: Provides keyboard access to landmark regions and headings (h1â€“h6) on a web page.

headingLevelAriaLabel.description: ariaLabel value for heading, including suffix indicating heading level

emptyContent.description: menu item text for heading with empty text content

noLandmarksMsg.description: menu group message: displayed when there are no 'main', 'search' or 'navigation' landmarks

noHeadingsMsg.description: menu group message: displayed when there are no headings that match the selected options

maxLevelLabel.description: options form: label for 'heading level' radio buttons

mainOnlyLabel.message: Only show headings found in main landmark
mainOnlyLabel.description: options form: label for 'main only' checkbox
